articles.author: Ron Amadeo
articles.title: Google will no longer back up the Internet: Cached webpages are dead - Ars Technica
articles.description: Google Search will no longer make site backups while crawling the web.
articles.content:
67

Google will no longer be keeping a backup of the entire Internet. Google Search's "cached" links have long been an alternative way to load a website that was down or had change… [+2350 chars]

articles.title: Cygnus Cargo Craft Arrives at Space Station As Private Astronauts Prepare for Return to Earth - SciTechDaily
